page.title: 04Car Parking in Newent
page.content: The majority of cars parked in Newent are the result of: {1.}People from outlying areas coming into Newent to do shopping. {2.}People who live in the centre of Newent in older properties that do not have a garage. { 3.}Tourists during Spring and Summer There is concern about the amount of car parking in the narrow streets and problems of safety. Recently a system of parking restrictions has been introduced in the form of double yellow lines marked on the roadside indicating no-parking. It is also felt that local car parks are only just adequate and that with the increased volume of traffic there should be traffic-safeguards because of the number of elderly people and mothers with young children in Newent.
